issue.title: [R] Handle complex summarize expressions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13778](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13778). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Right now we can do `summarize(x = agg(field), y = agg(expr))` but we can't do `z = agg(fn\(x\))` or `q = agg(field) + agg(field)`. This will require more complex expression massaging.
